name: Boomers Ate My World
description:
Made for Hawktober Game Jam 2021 with Pixel Game Maker MV!

Need a break from deadly viruses? Join an unnamed girl in her quest to prevent such things from happening in this comedic horror shooter!

THEME FOR JAM: 

- Death To The Old

CONTROLS:

- WADS to move

- Left mouse-click to shoot

- Space to confirm/continue

- F5 to reset game

- Esc to switch screen modes

CREDITS:

Developer - Baz

Music - PGMMV RTP

Art - Time Fantasy / Kenney

To Support Work:

Ko-fi | Patreon

If you  have issues starting the game on your PC, please install this other game I made that also redistributes the Windows VC++ requirements to play PGMMV games.
